name: Stray Souls: Dollhouse Story
summary: Welcome to a town where something that should not exist runs free; where no one is safe, not even an innocent child; and where a desperate wife will risk her beating heart to find her husband!

alternative_names.name: Stray Souls: Dollhouse Story Collector's Edition

esrb.synopsis: This is a hidden-object game in which players search through a town to uncover the mystery behind a man's disappearance. Players solve puzzles and search for specific items on screens filled with jumbled objects to gather clues and advance the storyline. As players uncover details from the man's past, some violent images are depicted: characters restrained on tables/chairs, a woman pushed from behind into a cage. The game also references some violent material (e.g., "He killed my parents and brought me here to perform an experiment on me!" and "[He] killed his parents and set the demons free."). Some scenes depict bloody handprints, blood stains, and large smears on objects.

pegi.synopsis:
The content of this game is suitable for persons aged 12 years and over only.
It contains: Non realistic looking violence towards human characters
